item.description:
This hike will take you over a swingy bridge and up to a gorgeos spot overlooking what locals call "the clamshell" The views are indescribable! The hike will follow the former Shepaug Railroad south and then a moderate climb up to the summit of Steep Rock overlook. Then down crossing the Shepaug River on a bridge. Explore the old railroad tunnel and follow the old railroad north and then some dirt road walking back to the parking area. About 4.5 miles total.

DIRECTIONS TO STEEP ROCK RESERVATION: From Route 47 in Washinton Depot, turn down River Rd (between the drug store & Citgo gas station) Follow River Rd for about 1.5 miles, and turn left onto Tunnel Rd (a dirt road) to enter the reservation. There are parking areas on both sides of the river.

After the hike there is an optional "snack stop" at an Italian Restaurant in Washington Depot


Contact: Amanda (203) 209-7779

item.name: Steep Rock Overlook Hike in Washington, CT
